admin.greeting: Hey, I'm here to track your XP in any chat. Add me to a chat and launch the /enable command from there.
admin.group_greeting: Hey, I'm here to track your XP in this chat. Ask an admin to launch the /enable command and try me out !.
admin.enabled: Done! Xp is now tracked in this group.
admin.enabled_no_rights: Only admins can enable the bot.
admin.enabled_already: I was already enabled in this group.
admin.disabled: Done! Xp is no longer tracked in this group.
admin.disabled_already: I was already disabled in this group.
admin.disabled_no_rights: Only admins can disable the bot.

warn: XP tracking is not enabled in this group. Ask an admin to launch the /enable command before tying me out.

xp.wait: Wait for {time} seconds before changing {name}'s XP
